resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102921</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102921</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085994</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The First Year</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Erste Jahr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Première Année</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Primeiro Ano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Primo Anno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρώτο έτος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Primer Año</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Essays on the author's experiences in her first year of teaching: the mistakes she made, what she learned from them, and how she used them to become a better teacher -- and how other first-year teachers can, too.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versuche auf den Erfahrungen des Autors in ihrem 
ersten Jahr des Unterrichtens: die Fehler, die sie machte, was 
sie von ihnen erlernte und wie sie sie benutzte, um ein besserer 
Lehrer zu werden -- und wie andere des ersten Jahres Lehrerdose, auch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essais sur les expériences de l'auteur en sa 
première année de l'enseignement : les erreurs qu'elle a 
faites, ce qu'elle a appris d'elles, et comment elle les avait 
l'habitude pour devenir un meilleur professeur -- et comment l'autre 
bidon de première année de professeurs, aussi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Essays nas experiências do autor em seu primeiro 
ano de ensinar: os erros que fêz, o que aprendeu delas, e como 
os usou se transformar um professor melhor -- e como a outra lata 
first-year dos professores, demasiado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Saggi sulle esperienze dell'autore durante il suo 
primo anno di istruzione: gli errori che ha fatto, che cosa ha 
imparato da loro e come le ha usate per diventare un insegnante 
migliore -- e come l'altra latta del primo anno degli insegnanti, 
anche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκίμια στην εμπειρία του συντάκτη στο πρώτο έτος 
διδασκαλίας της: τα λάθη που έκανε, τι έμαθε από τα, και 
πώς τα χρησιμοποίησε για να γίνει καλύτερος δάσκαλος -- και πώς 
άλλοι πρωτοετείς δάσκαλοι μπορούν, επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ensayos en las experiencias del autor en su primer
año de la enseñanza: las equivocaciones que ella incurrió en,
qué ella aprendió de ellas, y cómo ella las utilizó para hacer 
profesor mejor -- y cómo la otra lata del primer año de los 
profesores, también.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KRISTI JOHNSON SMITH
FN:KRISTI JOHNSON SMITH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085994</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102921</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/the-first-year</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
